projects.name: Mechanisms of Actions Drug Prediction Algorithm
projects.description: Applied and built Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, XG Boost tests, and PCA. Led a team of 3 to predict drugs based on biological actions, and contact of medicines with body cells

projects.name: US Super Store Global Sales
projects.description: Augmented an interactive, dynamic, and user-friendly Excel Dashboard using slicers, filters, pivot tables, and charts. Interpreted data to draw decisions for managerial actions, business strategies, operations, and performance

projects.name: Stock Price Analysis
projects.description: Harvested data from Yahoo Finance and performed forecasting. Seen how stock price has changed over time. Examined index, open, close, high, low, volume, and adjusted values of stocks data in Python and R

projects.name: COVID 19 Dashboard
projects.description: Analyzed the Coronavirus COVID 19 Global Cases from John Hopkins University CSSE and generated a Console. Investigated, forecasted, and visualized pandemics after-effects and trends every day with real-time information

projects.name: Smart Trash Can Monitoring System using IoT â€“ Creating Solutions for Smart Cities
projects.description: Guided a team of 5 to track, analyze, and notify trash can levels to officials to perform necessary actions. Won 2nd prize in Bachelors Capstone and Published a paper with five co-authors in IRJET Journal, Vol. 5 - Issue. 3

projects.name: Innovative Smart Farming Device
projects.description: Developed a Sensor Technology Product for Aquaculture Fields and won 1st prize in the Mad About Ideas Challenge. Classified at the Innovation Readiness Series with the IC2 Institute at the University of Texas at Austin (July 2017)
